name: SetCustomLabelsRunnerOrg
description:
Set custom labels for a self-hosted runner in an organization.

Updates custom labels for a specified self-hosted runner in an organization, removing any previous labels. Requires authentication with an access token having `admin:org` scope.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the organization. This is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: runner_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner to set custom labels.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner.

parameters.name: custom_labels
parameters.description: An array of custom label names to assign to the runner. Pass an empty array to remove all labels.

value_schema.description: The names of the custom labels to set for the runner. You can pass an empty array to remove all custom labels.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: runner_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: The names of the custom labels to set for the runner. You can pass an empty array to remove all custom labels.

value_schema.description: The names of the custom labels to set for the runner. You can pass an empty array to remove all custom labels.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
